imdb.plot outline: My Miami with Isabelle Fontes shows the best that the city got to offer. Each episode Isabelle chooses a (based in Miami) guest and they go to his/her 3 favorite places "where to shop", "where to eat" and "where to have fun". Boutiques, malls, designers, restaurants, events. Those and more on a show that is entertaining and informative.
imdb.title: My Miami with Isabelle Fontes
akas: My Miami with Isabelle Fontes (United States)
plot: _My Miami with Isabelle Fontes_ (qv) shows the best that the city got to offer. Each episode Isabelle chooses a (based in Miami) guest and they go to his/her 3 favorite places "where to shop", "where to eat" and "where to have fun". Boutiques, malls, designers, restaurants, events. Those and more on a show that is entertaining and informative.::My Miami
